data.name: RPG Maker VX Ace - Storytellers Music Pack Vol.1
data.detailed_description:
Elevate your story to new heights of emotion with these twenty tracks from composer Joel Steudler! This is music orchestrated to recall the sounds of the great anime and visual novel romance series... a fresh take on nostalgic favorite styles! Also includes twenty Music Events for impactful transitions between scenes.


- 20 BGM tracks suitable for romance, drama, sadness, comedy, danger, and uplifting scenes!
- 20 Music Events for memorable moments!
- .ogg, and .wav formats included.

Tracklist:

Comedy - Happy Hijinks
Comedy - Typical Goof
Danger - Dark Intentions
Danger - Uneasy Alleyway
Drama - Chasing Fate
Drama - Elegant Unrest
Drama - Haunting Memories
Drama - Rivals Clash
Romance - First Date
Romance - Light Heart
Romance - Mostly Melancholy
Romance - Nobody Closer
Romance - Sharing Moments
Romance - Yearning For You
Sad - Heartbreak Aches
Sad - I Recall
Sad - Love Not Enough
Sad - Turned Down
Uplifting - Glorious Day
Uplifting - Rising Spirits

data.short_description: Capture the feelings of classic visual novel and anime music with these twenty tracks from composer Joel Steudler! Emotions run high in this dramatic, romantic collection.
data.supported_languages: English, French, German, Spanish - Spain, Italian, Portuguese - Brazil, Japanese

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS:Microsoft® Windows® XP / Vista / 7 (32-bit/64-bit)
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
  • Graphics:1024 x 768 pixels or higher desktop resolution
  • Hard Drive:400 MB HD space
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Processor:Intel® Pentium® 4 2.0 GHz equivalent or faster processor
  • Memory:512 MB RAM
